thread.title: This tiny Pakistani couple doesn’t let bullies bring them down
thread.title_full: This tiny Pakistani couple doesn’t let bullies bring them down

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: This tiny Pakistani couple doesn’t let bullies bring them down
text:
A dwarf couple in Pakistan are winning hearts across the internet for not letting society dictate their happiness and living their life to the fullest. (Credit: Facebook) Remember the saying ‘When life gives you lemons then make lemonade’? There are people out there who live this expression to the hilt. A dwarf couple in Pakistan are winning hearts across the internet for not letting society dictate their happiness and living their life to the fullest.
Good Morning Aaj featured Sanober and her husband who are living a happily married life despite the challenges they have to face because of their stature. They share how their families met and eventually got them married.
One can’t help but feel amazed by their immense gratitude towards all the good that life has to offer like their supportive family and friends. Sanober and her husband are also doting parents to a cute son which makes their story even more heart-warmingly beautiful.
